name: Jogward
description:
Jogward is a fast paced medieval action twin stick shooter with focus on rewarding gameplay. Defend Jogward's home from hordes of Imperial troops with a selection of efficient melee and ranged weapons.


In this horde defense game you play as the hero Jogward and defend his home settlement from intruders. Defeat the invading enemies using Jogward's trusty sword or play more evasively and use a deadly bow. Collect the loot dropped by the foes and use it to enhance your equipment with powerful upgrades. The game allows for extreme specialization in combat stats making for a unique fighting experience.



Help the lone hero defeat the glooming evil, that has overrun his home land! Fight off endless waves of ever stronger enemy units with weapons that scale infinitely.

Features

  • Rewarding, fast paced combat. The focus of the game is fun, satisfying gameplay.
  • Selection of powerful weapons with unique special abilities.
  • Choose your playstyle with strong upgrades to weapons and level-up system for Jogward himself.
  • Infinite number of enemy waves. How long can you survive?
  • RPG character build system - create save games and progress infinitely.
  • Local high scores - see your best runs or compete with friends at home.
  • Soothing medieval world - a unique setting for an action twin stick shooter.
